00005 Module Name:

00007     ktrace.h
00008 
00009 Abstract:
00010 
00011     This module is an include file for use by all clients of the
00012     KTrace utility.
00013 
00014     By default, all kernel modules which have this module automatically
00015     included since an include for this file will exist in kx<arch>.h
00016

00018

00023     User or Kernel mode.
